name: The Incremental Store
description:
Run your own store and make a ton of money! 

You start with a bunch of empty shelves and a little bit of cash. Buy products to sell in your store. The more expensive a product is, the more money it will make. Rack up as much cash as you desire, then transfer that money into your real-life bank account.*

You win after making a million dollars. Post your time in the comments!

Made for the Clicker Jam Winter 2023. I completely missed that there was an additional theme (Interdimensional). So this game doesn't really fit that. Just imagine it takes place in another dimension...

Note: This is my first time using the Phaser.js Framework, so a lot of time went into figuring out how everything works.

Cheers!

Music: "In Your Arms" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
